    • Method Detail

      • performBeliefPropagation

        public static void performBeliefPropagation(BPMathModelNode[] modelNodes,
                            BPMathModelRelation[] modelRelations,
                            int dataNodeCount,
                            MismatchValues mismatches,
                            int numIterations)
        Method performs Belief Propagation (BP) where nodes messages are passed between the nodes of the Model Graph, and link messages are passed between the links of the Model graph. The messages hold information on the mismatch between the attributes of the Model and Data graphs.
        Parameters:
        modelNodes - An array of the nodes in the Model Graph
        modelRelations - An array of the relations in the Model Graph (links between nodes)
        dataNodeCount - An integer that holds the number of nodes in the Data Graph
        mismatches - MismatchValues holds the mismatches between attributes of node/link in model and data graphs
        numIterations - An integer that holds the maximum number of iterations for BP to be performed

      • print

        public static void print(BPMathModelNode[] modelNodes,
         BPMathModelRelation[] modelRelations,
         boolean printL,
         boolean printMu,
         boolean printP)
        Method prints the information of interest to the console. Information of interest is specified by setting the appropriate boolean variables to true
        Parameters:
        modelNodes - Array of the nodes in the Model Graph
        modelRelations - Array if the relations/links in the Model Graph
        printL - Boolean variable to print outgoing (L) and incoming (LR) link information
        printMu - Boolean variable to print the messages sent between nodes in Model Graph
        printP - Boolean variable to print the probabilities that are encoded within the messages

      • printLorLR

        public static void printLorLR(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> list)
        Method prints the outgoing (L) and incoming (LR) relation information
        Parameters:
        list - A double list that holds information contained within outgoing (L) and incoming (LR) links within the Model Graph

      • printMu

        public static void printMu(java.util.ArrayList<DataNodeAndMu> list)
        Method prints the messages between nodes in Model Graph
        Parameters:
        list - A list that contains message that contains information of the mismatch between a node in the Model graph and the approriate node in the Data Graph

      • printProb

        public static void printProb(java.util.ArrayList<DataNodeAndMu> list)
        Method prints the probabilities contained within the messages Mu
        Parameters:
        list - ArrayList - A list that contains message that contains probability of a node in the Model Graph and a node within the Data Graph

      • updateMu

        public static void updateMu(BPMathModelNode modelNode,
            java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> nLink,
            java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double>> nLinkReverse,
            MismatchValues mismatches)
        Method updates the messages that are sent between nodes and links based on the mismatch values
        Parameters:
        modelNode - Specific node within Model Graph
        nLink - A list of all the outgoing links from that node
        nLinkReverse - A list of all the incoming links from that node
        mismatches - The mismatches between attributes of nodes/links between Model and Data Graphs

                                               RelationshipMismatchProvider.MismatchRelationshipType mismatchRelationshipType)

        Parameters:
        r - Specific outgoing relation from a node
